item.title: Survey: Nearly 70% of Users Plan to Upgrade to iPhone 17
item.description: A new survey has found that nearly seven in ten iPhone owners in the United States plan to upgrade to an iPhone 17 model, signaling strong demand ahead of Apple’s expected unveiling of the devices at
